title: Huipil
description: predominately red and white vertically striped huipil with multicolored embroidery around shoulders, chest, and back; embroidery consists of overlaping turned cubes surrounded by other smaller geometric designs; neck opening is square and decorated with alternating green and yellow colors; three paneled; sleeves consist of slits cut at shoulders
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
